1{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Symbol type.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.Symbol
7  ( -- * Symbol
8    -- ** Data type
9    Symbol (..),
10    -- ** Symbol test
11    isGeneralSymbol, isPlainSymbol, isNumericSymbol, isShortSymbol,
12    -- ** Char test
13    isSymbolChar, isGeneralChar, isPlainChar, isNumericChar,
14    -- ** Next symbol
15    nextSymbol, nextSymbolPlain,
16  ) where
17
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture               as O
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                   as B
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.Next     as S
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.Message  as Msg
22
23
24-- --------------------------------------------  Symbol
25
26-- ----------------------  Data type
27
28-- | Symbol class.
29--
30-- Relation between character classes and symbol classes.
31-- The char class @number'@ means Unicode number except for @0-9@.
32-- @G@ for general symbol, @P@ for plain, @N@ for numeric.
33--
34-- >   Char class   Symbol class        Symbol type
35-- >   ------------ ------------------- -----------------
36-- >   "0-9"        ( G ) ( P ) ( N )   SymbolCommon
37-- >   "-"          ( G ) ( P ) ( N )   SymbolCommon
38-- >   letter       ( G )   P           SymbolPlain
39-- >   mark         ( G )   P           SymbolPlain
40-- >   number'      ( G )   P           SymbolPlain
41-- >   "_?"         ( G )   P           SymbolPlain
42-- >   "+"          ( G )         N     SymbolNumeric
43-- >   "*=<>~"        G                 SymbolGeneral
44-- >   ".#"                       N     SymbolNumeric
45--
46-- Partial order between the symbol classes.
47--
48-- >                     ( GPN ) Common
49-- >                    /      |
50-- >           Plain ( GP )  ( GN ) Numeric
51-- >                /  |    /  |
52-- >   Short ( P.P )   |   /   |
53-- >            :      |  /    |
54-- >         General ( G )     |
55-- >            :      :     ( N ) Numeric
56-- >            :      :       :
57-- >            ................ Unknown
58
59data Symbol
60    = SymbolCommon    String         -- ^ __1.__ General-plain-numeric symbol
61                                     --
62                                     --   >>> nextSymbol "1"
63                                     --   ("", SymbolCommon "1")
64
65    | SymbolPlain     String         -- ^ __2.__ Plain (include general) symbol
66                                     --
67                                     --   >>> nextSymbol "a"
68                                     --   ("", SymbolPlain "a")
69
70    | SymbolNumeric   String         -- ^ __3.__ Numeric (include general) symbol
71                                     --
72                                     --   >>> nextSymbol "+"
73                                     --   ("", SymbolNumeric "+")
74
75    | SymbolGeneral   String         -- ^ __4.__ General (not plain nor numeric) symbol
76                                     --
77                                     --   >>> nextSymbol "="
78                                     --   ("", SymbolGeneral "=")
79
80    | SymbolShort     String String  -- ^ __5.__ Short symbol (Plain @"."@ Plain)
81                                     --
82                                     --   >>> nextSymbol "a.xxx"
83                                     --   ("", SymbolShort "a" "xxx")
84
85    | SymbolUnknown   String         -- ^ __6.__ Unknown symbol
86                                     --
87                                     --   >>> nextSymbol "a+"
88                                     --   ("", SymbolUnknown "a+")
89
90      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
91
92
93-- ----------------------  Symbol test
94
95-- | Test symbol is general, in other words,
96--   'SymbolCommon', 'SymbolPlain' or 'SymbolGeneral'.
97isGeneralSymbol :: O.Test Symbol
98isGeneralSymbol (SymbolCommon _)   = True
99isGeneralSymbol (SymbolPlain _)    = True
100isGeneralSymbol (SymbolGeneral _)  = True
101isGeneralSymbol _                  = False
102
103-- | Test symbol is plain, in other words,
104--   'SymbolCommon' or 'SymbolPlain'.
105isPlainSymbol :: O.Test Symbol
106isPlainSymbol (SymbolCommon _)     = True
107isPlainSymbol (SymbolPlain _)      = True
108isPlainSymbol _                    = False
109
110-- | Test symbol is numeric, in other words,
111--   'SymbolCommon' or 'SymbolNumeric'.
112isNumericSymbol :: O.Test Symbol
113isNumericSymbol (SymbolCommon _)   = True
114isNumericSymbol (SymbolNumeric _)  = True
115isNumericSymbol _                  = False
116
117-- | Test symbol is 'SymbolShort'.
118isShortSymbol :: O.Test Symbol
119isShortSymbol (SymbolShort _ _)    = True
120isShortSymbol _                    = False
121
122
123-- ----------------------  Char test
124
125-- | Test character is a symbol component.
126isSymbolChar :: O.Test Char
127isSymbolChar c = isGeneralChar c || isNumericChar c
128
129-- | Test character is a general-symbol component.
130isGeneralChar :: O.Test Char
131isGeneralChar = isCharG'
132
133-- | Test character is a plain-symbol component.
134isPlainChar :: O.Test Char
135isPlainChar = isCharP'
136
137-- | Test character is a numeric-symbol component.
138isNumericChar :: O.Test Char
139isNumericChar = isCharN'
140
141isCharGpn, isCharDigit, isCharHyphen :: O.Test Char
142isCharGpn    c  = isCharDigit c || isCharHyphen c
143isCharDigit  c  = c >= '0' && c <= '9'
144isCharHyphen c  = c == '-'
145
146isCharGp :: O.Test Char
147isCharGp c =
148    case O.majorGeneralCategory c of
149      O.UnicodeLetter    -> True
150      O.UnicodeMark      -> True
151      O.UnicodeNumber    -> True      -- include isCharDigit
152      _                  -> c == '_' || c == '?'
153
154isCharGn, isCharG, isCharN :: O.Test Char
155isCharGn c   = c == '+'
156isCharG  c   = c `elem` "*=<>~"
157isCharN  c   = c == '.' || c == '#'
158
159isCharGp', isCharP', isCharGn', isCharG', isCharN' :: O.Test Char
160isCharGp' c  = isCharGp  c || isCharHyphen c
161isCharP'     = isCharGp'
162isCharGn' c  = isCharGpn c || isCharGn c
163isCharG'  c  = isCharGp' c || isCharGn c || isCharG c
164isCharN'  c  = isCharGn' c || isCharN  c
165
166
167-- ---------------------- Next symbol
168
169-- | Get next symbol.
170--
171--   >>> nextSymbol "foo bar"
172--   (" bar", SymbolPlain "foo")
173--
174--   >>> nextSymbol "0.50"
175--   ("", SymbolNumeric "0.50")
176--
177--   >>> nextSymbol "= /a"
178--   (" /a", SymbolGeneral "=")
179--
180nextSymbol :: S.Next Symbol
181nextSymbol cs0 = symbolGpn O.zero cs0 where
182    done n cs k           = (cs, k $ take n cs0)
183
184    -- General and Plain and Numeric
185    symbolGpn n (O.uncons -> Just (c, cs))
186        | isCharGpn c     = symbolGpn n' cs
187        | isCharGp  c     = symbolGp  n' cs
188        | isCharGn  c     = symbolGn  n' cs
189        | isCharG   c     = symbolG   n' cs
190        | isCharN   c     = symbolN   n' cs
191        | isSymbolChar c  = symbolUnk n' cs
192        where n' = n + 1
193    symbolGpn n cs        = done n cs SymbolCommon
194
195    -- General and Plain
196    symbolGp n (O.uncons -> Just (c, cs))
197        | c == '.'        = shortBody (take n cs0) cs
198        | isCharGp' c     = symbolGp  n' cs
199        | isCharG   c     = symbolG   n' cs
200        | isSymbolChar c  = symbolUnk n' cs
201        where n' = n + 1
202    symbolGp n cs         = done n cs SymbolPlain
203
204    -- General and Numeric
205    symbolGn n (O.uncons -> Just (c, cs))
206        | isCharGn' c     = symbolGn  n' cs
207        | isCharG   c     = symbolG   n' cs
208        | isCharN   c     = symbolN   n' cs
209        | isSymbolChar c  = symbolUnk n' cs
210        where n' = n + 1
211    symbolGn n cs         = done n cs SymbolNumeric
212
213    -- General
214    symbolG n (O.uncons -> Just (c, cs))
215        | isCharG' c      = symbolG   n' cs
216        | isSymbolChar c  = symbolUnk n' cs
217        where n' = n + 1
218    symbolG n cs          = done n cs SymbolGeneral
219
220    -- Numeric
221    symbolN n (O.uncons -> Just (c, cs))
222        | isCharN' c      = symbolN   n' cs
223        | isSymbolChar c  = symbolUnk n' cs
224        where n' = n + 1
225    symbolN n cs          = done n cs SymbolNumeric
226
227    -- Unknown symbol
228    symbolUnk n (O.uncons -> Just (c, cs))
229        | isSymbolChar c  = symbolUnk (n + 1) cs
230    symbolUnk n cs        = done n cs SymbolUnknown
231
232shortBody :: String -> S.Next Symbol
233shortBody pre cs0 = short O.zero cs0 where
234    done n cs k           = (cs, k $ take n cs0)
235
236    -- Plain "." Plain
237    short n (O.uncons -> Just (c, cs))
238        | isCharGp' c     = short n' cs
239        | isSymbolChar c  = symbolUnk n' cs
240        where n' = n + 1
241    short n cs            = done n cs $ SymbolShort pre
242
243    -- Unknown symbol
244    symbolUnk n (O.uncons -> Just (c, cs))
245        | isSymbolChar c  = symbolUnk (n + 1) cs
246    symbolUnk n cs        = done n cs SymbolUnknown
247
248-- | Get next plain symbol, i.e.,
249--   'SymbolCommon' or 'SymbolPlain'.
250--
251--   >>> nextSymbolPlain "foo bar"
252--   Right (" bar","foo")
253--
254--   >>> nextSymbolPlain "12.0"
255--   Left (AbortReason "Expect ordinary symbol" ...)
256--
257nextSymbolPlain :: S.AbNext String
258nextSymbolPlain cs =
259    case nextSymbol cs of
260      (cs', sym) -> do w <- getSymbolPlain sym
261                       Right (cs', w)
262
263getSymbolPlain :: Symbol -> B.Ab String
264getSymbolPlain (SymbolCommon w)  = Right w
265getSymbolPlain (SymbolPlain  w)  = Right w
266getSymbolPlain _                 = Msg.expOrdSym
267
